node.display_long_description:
WINNER - 2020 Primetime Emmy¬Æ Award for Outstanding Innovation in Interactive Media.
WINNER - Best VR Experience at 76th Venice International Film Festival.
‚ÄúThe Line‚Äù is a 15-20 minute interactive story about love and fear of change, allowing you to unlock an enchanted miniature model of two miniature dolls, Pedro and Rosa.
Set within a scale model of 1940s S√£o Paulo, this room-scale experience invites you to pull on knobs and even crawl under the machinery to unfold the story of these figurines who are perfect for each other but reluctant to live out their love. 
 
"The Line" is great to showcase VR for first-time users. 
 
Narrated by Rodrigo Santoro and directed by Ricardo Laganaro.
 
Additional modes: 
Room-scale and seated mode: Freely around the scale model, or experience the story around you for those with limited space or reduced mobility. Narration in English, Portuguese, Korean. SDH Subtitles in English, Portuguese, Korean, Japanese, French, Spanish, German.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
- Included full text localization and SDH subtitles in Korean, Japanese, French, Spanish and German
- Included narration in Korean
- Fixed minor bugs
- Quality of life updates

nodes.title: The Line is Now Available with Seven Multilingual Subtitles and Three Multilingual Narrations!
nodes.body_text:
The award-winning interactive love story just got better with brand new language support! Now we have three great narrations and seven supported subtitles to bring the story to more people around the world. Check out the list of languages below:

Current Narration Support
English
Portuguese
Korean



Current Subtitles Support
English
Portuguese
Korean
Spanish
French
Japanese
German

nodes.title: ‚ÄúThe Line‚Äù Wins Primetime Emmy¬Æ Award For Outstanding Innovation in Interactive Programming üéâ
nodes.body_text:
‚ÄúThe Line‚Äù has been awarded a Primetime Emmy¬Æ for ‚ÄúOutstanding Innovation in Interactive Programming‚Äù. In addition to its innovative storytelling language,  ‚ÄúThe Line‚Äù is the first cinematic narrative experience to integrate Oculus Quest‚Äôs hand tracking technology.

Made for all ages and perfect for showing off to friends and family. Experience "The Line" today on your Oculus devices! üåª

node.reviewDescription: The Line is a cute VR love story that's without a doubt worth the every penny. It's just long enough to get you engaged in the story and characters, but short enough that it would be comfortable for just about anyone to finish. It requires you to move around quite a bit, but you're mostly just watching and listening. On the subject of watching and listening, I absolutely love both the animation and narration. My favorite part is that this game uses hand tracking. It doesn't make a massive impact on game play and when you interact with objects it's more like a button press, but that's fine. I think the whole point of hand tracking here is to allow the player feel more involved in the world which let's you get more involved in the story. Experiencing this with hand tracking makes me think that a controller would be more of a burden on the immersion. Just buy it if you have the 25 minutes or whatever it is. It's worth it.

Narrated by Rodrigo Santoro, ‚ÄúThe Line‚Äù is great for first-time VR users.
